name: oh no, u have to make a game
name_original: oh no, u have to make a game
description:
Be productive for the sake of not finishing the jam game, through a series of mundane tasks and lazily-spelled narrations. Based on real life and people.

Made in a rush in the Bitsy editor for the "oh no" themed Bitsy jam.

Features

  • High dad jokes : pixel ratio.
  • You have a pet cat.
